name: King Conga
description:
We've all dreamed of The World's Longest Conga Line®

Now you can have it. With our state-of-the-art technology, we've managed to realise that dream in unimaginably realistic visual fidelity. I mean, just take a look at the screenshots. You probably thought they were photos at first, but you were wrong.

That's okay. We're here to help.

---
How to Play What to Do

Make the longest conga! But make sure not to hit into any houses or even your own conga line, otherwise you'll have to start again!

Controls

Keyboard

Control/Key/ButtonUseKeyboard
A / Left ArrowGo left
D / Right ArrowGo rightEnterStart the Conga!EscapeQuit
RRestart
Gamepad
Left Stick
Go left/Right
AStart the Conga!
StartQuitSelectRestart How do I pause?

You can't stop the Conga. Nobody can.
